items.title: 2nd Birthday Skin Pack
items.description: Minecraft is growing up, time to celebrate together our 2nd Birthday!

items.title: 2nd Birthday Skin Pack - 2015
items.description:
Minecraft is growing up, time to celebrate together our 2nd Birthday!
Only available for Minecraft on PlayStation 4 (2019).

items.title: Legacy Skin Pack
items.description: Get cracking with these starter skins and old favorites brought over from Minecraft editions of yore. Widen your wardrobe, turn out in a tux, or rock it as a croc!

items.title: LittleBigPlanet™ Mash-up
items.description:
Mix the crazy, non-stop creativity of LittleBigPlanet™ into the endless fun and freedom of Minecraft with this special mashup pack.
Sackboy®, Sackgirl®, OddSock, Toggle and Swoop will decorate your Minecraft universe with a whole heap of LBP characters, creatures and stuff.
Only available for Minecraft on PlayStation®4.

items.title: Marvel Avengers Skin Pack
items.description: Step into Minecraft dressed as one of Earth’s Mightiest Heroes (or powerful villains) with this incredible Skin Pack, featuring core team members from Marvel’s Avengers including Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, and many more iconic characters from the Marvel Universe.

items.title: Marvel Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack
items.description: Join Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy in the most cosmic Marvel skin pack for for Minecraft yet! Star-Lord, Gamora, Rocket, Groot and Drax are only part of the pack of 24 skins inspired both by Marvel’s blockbuster film and the comic books.

items.title: Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack
items.description: Look out! Here comes the Spider-Man Skin Pack! Featuring an assortment of 35 friends and foes straight from the saga of your favorite Wall-Crawler, this pack is sure to amaze. Catch it now!

items.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
items.description: Assemble your Mighty Morphin Power Rangers team and Go Go!

items.title: Mumbo Jumbo & Grian Skins
items.description: Private skin pack containing Mumbo Jumbo’s and Grian’s skins for use in their Minecraft Earth road trip video series, debuting at Minecon Live 2020.

items.title: Stranger Things Skin Pack
items.description: Something is coming, something hungry for blood. A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness. It is almost here… Boom! Stranger Things comes to Minecraft! Join Mike, Dustin, Lucas, Will, Eleven, Joyce, Hopper and many more as they survive monsters, adolescence and 80's fashion choices.

items.title: The Simpsons Skin Pack
items.description: The Simpsons as you have never seen them before; in pure, unadulterated Minecraft block-o-vision! Don't miss out this awesome pack featuring 24 characters from the series.
